participant_1.background:
I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others.
I wake up, take my dog, Collie, for a walk and then drink the day away.
I spend time with my family and work on hobbies when I'm not at work.
I spent the week traveling and writing about my experiences.
My most exotic travel experience was when I went to Thailand and saw the floating markets.

participant_2.background:
I'm so proud of being a vegan, and I would brag about it to my friends if I were famous.
I've lived in many places, but I grew up in a small town in the Midwest.
My favorite thing to do is watch TV and admire beautiful flowers.
i live on a pig farm.
i am fascinated with ghosts.

content.text: I'm from a small town in the Midwest, but I've lived in many places.
I have too!  I love traveling.  Where is your favorite place you've ever been?
I would have to say Thailand.  The people were so friendly and the food was amazing.  I loved the floating markets.
I've never been to Thailand, but it sounds beautiful!  What kind of food did you eat there?
A lot of seafood!  I had some of the freshest shrimp and fish I've ever had.
That sounds amazing!  I love seafood.  I'm a vegan, but I would make an exception for some fresh seafood from Thailand!
I'm impressed!  I don't think I could ever be a vegan.  I love meat too much.
It's not for everyone!  But I feel good about it.  I'm healthier and I feel more in control of my life.
That's great!  I'm glad you're happy with your lifestyle.  I can't imagine not eating meat, but I'm sure it's great for you.
It is!  I've been doing it for a few years now and I feel great.
Well, I'm glad you're happy!  I'm going to go make some dinner.  It was nice talking to you!
You too!  Have a nice night!
